page.title: 05Majorettes in Cowdenbeath
page.content: In July 1977 a well known instructor of majoretting in Fife set out to form a majorette troupe.He obtained the use of the Y.W. / Y.M.C.A hall for the girls to practise in then advertised for girls 5-12 years of age.The response was tremendous,almost 100 girls turned up for the audition from which 36 were chosen.There are eight committee members this year,one committee member makes all the uniforms herself.We have lots of outings for the majorettes.On Saturday 22 June 1985 the majorettes went to North Berwick.They did a very good display and everyone enjoyed it.For working hard over the year we always receive medals from our trainer.The one who has been best over the year wins the majorette of the year award.
